text: Nicola Materazzi (28 January 1939 â€“ 24 August 2022) was an Italian mechanical engineer. He helped design many sports and racing cars, including the Ferrari 288 GTO, Ferrari F40, Bugatti EB110 and B Engineering Edonis. He was nicknamed "Mr F40" or the "father of the F40". ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Italian mechanical engineers Category:People from Campania
